N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.3 - Decals

State Regulations

The Watch Your Car program front windshield decal shall be
a rectangle, 4 inches wide x 21/2 inches high, made of reflective sheeting
containing the language and design as mandated by the Division of Criminal

Justice Services. The Watch Your Car rear window decal shall be circular, 33/4
inches in diameter, made of reflective sheeting containing the design as
mandated by the Division of Criminal Justice Services. The Watch Your Car
international decal, which shall be placed next to the Night Program front
windshield decal, shall be a rectangle 53/8 wide x 2 inches high displaying the
language and design as mandated by the Division of Criminal Justice Services. The Watch Your Car front windshield, rear window and international decals are
displayed in subdivisions (a)-(c) of this section. (a) Front windshield decal--4 inches wide x
21/2 inches high 3M reflective sticker containing the language and design as
mandated by NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services

Image
(b) Rear window decal--33/4 inches diameter
3M reflective sticker containing the design as mandated by NYS Division of

Criminal Justice Services. Image
(c) International decal--53/8 inches wide x 2
inches high the language and design as mandated by NYS Division of Criminal

Justice Services. Image

The international decal is for vehicles which are not
generally operated near international borders or ports. This decal has an
outline of the continental United States superimposed against the United States
flag and will be placed next to the Night Program front windshield decal. To
participate in the program, motor vehicle owners need to sign a voluntary
consent form and obtain this decal authorizing law enforcement officers to stop
their motor vehicles if they are not normally driven across or in the proximity
of international land borders or ports. Notes
